notes: While [Complete Disregard] is probably the pick that's most likely to lead to a good deck. If you don't take [Omnath, Locus of Rage] and try to build a sweet deck why are you even drafting? He makes 5/5 tokens that bolt things when they die. You might even wheel the [Blighted Woodland]  which will either help you ramp out Omnath or make tons of tokens.
